official_title: A bill to prohibit all United States assistance and exports (except for food and medicine) to, and all imports of articles from, any country which produces and exports opium or its illicit derivatives.

summary.text: Directs the President to suspend U.S. assistance to, prohibit U.S. exports to and imports from, any country which produces and exports opium or any of its illicit derivatives. Exempts exports of food or medicine from such prohibitions. Exempts from such prohibitions countries that export opium or its derivatives solely for pharmaceutical purposes.
